TopicTitle: Crash on revert still and unable to start new world with 0 in progress (GAME BROKEN)

Articles.Content:
In KSP i tried deleting worlds because i thought that was the problem and creating a new world but it crashed before finishing to create the world.

- - - Updated - - -

P.S. #CANNOTPLAY

Please read [this sticky thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide) and post the requested information. We need this information before we can diagnose your issue.

I has simler problm insted of it I get evre gage posable in vnila KSP and cam falls thro wold

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-22T13:08:30Z" title="03/22/2016 01:08  PM" data-short="8 yr">March 22, 2016</time> by Red Iron Crown**
  
Easy with the all-caps, please.

Rather than adding your post to a 10 month old thread that only bears a very faint resemblance to your issue, you should read the post that Supernovy linked above and, if you can't diagnose and fix the issue yourself with the information given there, then post a new thread including all the information that thread mentions (screenshots, logs, dxdiag etc).
